title: Computer specs for decent frames per second?
body: Been looking around for a desktop just to play this game, I don't understand amount of cores and ghz Is it possible to find a second hand desktop that can play lol for around $250-300?

replies.body:
Processor: Intel(R) Celeron(R) CPU B815 @ 1.60GHz, 1600 Mhz, 2 Core(s), 2 Logical Processor(s)
RAM: 2GB
I get around 70-80FPS on League, but really bad FPS on literally every other game (except minecraft and those basics)

p.s: my computer was 120$ from a second hand store :3
also what should I look for? I saw the recommended specs but don't understand different brands of graphics cards and cores.
